titles.title: Give me oil in my Lamp

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning.
Give me oil in my lamp, I pray.
Give me oil in my lamp, keep my burning,
Keep me burning till the break of day.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna,
Sing hosanna to the King of kings.
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna,
Sing hosanna to the King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Give me joy in my heart, keep me praising…

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Give me peace in my heart, keep me resting…

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Give me love in my heart, keep me serving…
